answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Derald, 
You'll need to contact ICMA-RC for information on your retirement account. (ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can visit their website at www.icma-rc.org, or call 1-800-669-7400.
